properties.areaDesc: Breton Sound; Chandeleur Sound; Coastal waters from Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River to Port Fourchon Louisiana from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal Waters from Port Fourchon LA to Lower Atchafalaya River LA out 20 nm; Coastal waters from the Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River to Port Fourchon Louisiana out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Port Fourchon Louisiana to Lower Atchafalaya River LA from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 6 at 9:05PM CST until February 7 at 10:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, northwest winds 20 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 40 kt and seas 6 to 11 ft. For the Small Craft
Advisory, seas 5 to 8 ft expected.

* WHERE...Portions of Gulf of Mexico.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 6 AM CST Friday. For the
Small Craft Advisory, from 6 AM to 10 AM CST Friday.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST FRIDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 10 AM CST FRIDAY
